positive_examples: This is an example of coalition game.
The coalition game demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed coalition game in this context.
A typical case of coalition game would involve these features.
The concept of coalition game applies here.
A cooperative game where players form binding coalitions to maximize their collective payoff.
negative_examples: This is an example of evolutionary game, not coalition game.
This represents cooperative game in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvolutionaryGame, or other types of CooperativeGame

definition: A cooperative game where players form coalitions to achieve collective benefits.
